original: 評曹操是能夠安定天下的命世之才，曹操撰文緬懷。他人亦評：秉文握武，聞仁必行，睹義斯居，謙儉下士...
text: Commenting on Cao Cao's ability to stabilize the world, Cao Cao wrote an article in memory of him. Others also commented:  Bingwen holds martial arts, hearing benevolence must do, see righteousness living, modest and thrifty corporal...
